DOC.brief_summary: To determine time administration indomethacin affect primary outcome post-ERCP pancreatitis ( PEP ) . Patients undergo ERCP randomly assign receive pre post-procedure rectal indomethacin prevent occurrence PEP .
DOC.brief_title: Timing Indomethacin Administration Prevention Post-ERCP Pancreatitis ( PEP )
DOC.criteria: All patient refer ERCP University Alberta Age great 18 year Ability provide write informed consent Acute pancreatitis Active peptic ulcer disease Rectal disease Aspirininduced asthma Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) induce hypersensitivity Pregnancy Breast feed Creatinine clearance < 30 ml/min
